When the Java Debug UI is loaded in response to a resource delta, it fails, as 
it attempts to create some default breakpoints to handle compilation errors and 
suspend on uncaught exceptions.
Fixed. Forked breakpoint creation in JavaDebugOptionsManager

traces.message: The resource tree is locked for  modifications.
